outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>Mario's side special, Cape, is active frames 12 to 14 (Reflects 6 to 20 and  1.5× 50% Break Threshold). Mario can act on frame 36. You can ask about another one of Mario's moves, or name another character and move.</speak>

<speak>Mario's side special, Cape, is active frames 12 to 14 (Reflects 6 to 20 and  1.5× 50% Break Threshold). Mario can act on frame 36. You can ask about another one of Mario's moves, or name another character and move.</speak>
